content: SAO PAULO  Sept 5 A preliminary report from Brazil's antitrust authority Cade recommended approval of a joint venture by Brazil's largest banks to start a credit research bureau  the agency said on Monday.
name: Fair Isaac Corporation
title: Brazil banks get early antitrust approval for credit bureau
